qas.question: Does Burma have more than one religion ?

answers.text: Many religions are practised in Myanmar

qas.question: Are public displays allowed for the celebration of religion in Myanmar ?

answers.text: Festivals can be held on a grand scale.

qas.question: Are all welcomed to practice faith openly in Burma

answers.text: Christian and Muslim populations do, however, face religious persecution

qas.question: Can anyone in Burma Join the military forces in Burma ?

answers.text: it is hard, if not impossible, for non-Buddhists to join the army

qas.question: What are the best routes for career achievement in Burma ?

answers.text: join the army or get government jobs, the main route to success in the country.

context: <a0_0>Many religions are practised in Myanmar<a0_0/>. Religious edifices and orders have been in existence for many years. <a1_0>Festivals can be held on a grand scale.<a1_0/> The <a2_0>Christian and Muslim populations do, however, face religious persecution<a2_0/> and <a3_0>it is hard, if not impossible, for non-Buddhists to <a4_0>join the army<a3_0/> or get government jobs, the main route to success in the country.<a4_0/> Such persecution and targeting of civilians is particularly notable in Eastern Myanmar, where over 3000 villages have been destroyed in the past ten years. More than 200,000 Muslims have fled to Bangladesh over the last 20 years to escape Islamophobic persecution.
